mapper.select: select vinum, viname, videsc, viaddress, viphone, vicredat, vicretim from vendor_info where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into vendor_info(viname, videsc, viaddress, viphone, vicredat, vicretim) values(#{viName},#{viDesc},#{viAddress},date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),date_format(now(),'%H%i%s'))
